live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
60521.summary: Some customers in Kamloops, Vernon & Surrounding Areas of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60521.title: Apr 27 - Kelowna (Kamloops, Vernon & Surrounding Areas ) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
